column2: By clicking "I agree" below you are indicating that you are at least 18 years of age, have read the above, and agree to participate in this research activity.
column3: On the whole, are you very satisfied, fairly satisfied, not very satisfied or not at all satisfied with the life you lead?
column4: How would you judge the current situation of the UK economy?
column5: What are your expectations for the next 12 months: will the next 12 months be better, worse or the same, when it comes to the economic situation in the UK?
column6:
Politics is an important part of democracy. Without people participating in the political process, democracy would cease to function. Some people read about politics every day, some only a few times a month. This question tests that you're paying attention. Please respond that you read about politics once a day.

Based on the above, what do you respond?
